title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Skills: Agile Evidence-Based Simulation for Healthcare Professional Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational medical knowledge and clinical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply patient care protocols with 90% accuracy through VR simulations within two weeks.
Learners can improve clinical decision-making in three or more simulation scenarios using evidence-based medicine (EBM) approaches.
Learners achieve a 20% improvement in diagnostic accuracy through peer feedback and formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
